task.title: Viewing Workflow Reports from your Dashboard
task.shortdesc: Workflow reports are a collection of objects, organized by project administrators. You can view these reports from your account dashboard.

taskbody.context: You need to be logged in to your CWRC account.

step.cmd: From your account dashboard, expand the right Workflow Reports column.
Click on one of the Workflow Reports from the list.
This will take you to a new page with the list of objects in the selected Workflow Report.
step.info: The workflow objects are presented like the search results. You can scroll through them and filter the results.
